name: Tank Stealing Aliens
description:
Game made for GMTK Gamejam 2021 "Joined together" 

Edit: I had a Bug that made the launch from the browser impossible and had to drop out to fix it. I would still love to hear your opinions in the comments. Thank you very much. 

The Space President gave you the Space War deciding task to steal a Tank from the Humans. Getting in was easy enough, but now you need to get out with the tank you stole. Your Spacecraft is able to phase through the human barriers, but the Tank isn't. And to make matters worse, the humans installed anti-Space technology "Spikes" throughout your escape route. Try to get to the end of the Level, so you can deliver the Tank, complete the Task for the Space President and make your Space Mom proud.

_______________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

WASD - Move the UFO
